sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const MentorsSection: React.FC = () => { const [scrollProgress, setScrollProgress] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const section = document.getElementById('mentors-section'); if (section) { const rect = section.getBoundingClientRect(); const windowHeight = window.innerHeight; // Start filling when section top reaches the top of viewport const triggerPoint = 0; if (rect.top <= triggerPoint) { // Calculate progress based on section position relative to viewport const sectionHeight = rect.height; const scrollProgress = Math.min(Math.max((triggerPoint - rect.top) / sectionHeight, 0), 1); setScrollProgress(scrollProgress); } else { setScrollProgress(0); } } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (

Trained 1000+ senior leaders (CGI India, Compass Group Japan, Reckitt Europe, US Navy, etc.).

Author of 4 books & 3 educational programs on AI adoption.

Advisor to tech firms & academic programs.

Influenced global AI policy (European AI Alliance).

Co-launched the International AI Directory.

); }; export default MentorsSection;
